name: God of the Depths
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Faith, +1 Production, -1 Gold] from every [Ocean]

name: The Ancient Ones
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Faith, +1 Gold] from every [Shrine] <when below [0] Happiness>

name: Mirthful Worship
uniques: [+1 Happiness] from every [Shrine] <when not at war>

name: Where no man has gone before
Freedom to Share
uniques: [+1 Science, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Happiness, -2 Gold] from each Trade Route

name: False Friends
uniques: [+2 Science, -1 Culture] for every [4] global followers [in foreign cities]

name: Inquisition
uniques: [+2 Happiness, +1 Production, -1 Science, -1 Culture] for every [2] global followers [in annexed cities]
May buy [Inquisitor] units with [Gold] [in annexed cities]

name: Forced Labour
uniques: May buy [Worker] units for [100] [Faith] [in cities following this religion]
